Key Match Events: Colombia won 2-1 against Argentina with goals from Mosquera (25') and Rodriguez (60' pen.)
Duran (79') and Vargas (90') scored for Argentina
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina will be without Lionel Messi due to his ongoing recovery from an injury
Julian Alvarez and Lautaro Martinez are set to start in attack for Argentina in Messi's absence
Scaloni could opt to start in a 3-5-2 formation with Nicolas Gonzalez starting as a makeshift left wing-back
Post-Match Reflections: Argentina captain Lionel Messi was forced off after an hour of the Copa America final against Colombia in July and has yet to make a full recovery
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina possible starting lineup: E. Martinez; Molina, Otamendi, Romero, Li. Martinez; De Paul, Mac Allister, Fernandez, Lo Celso; Alvarez, La. Martinez
Taty Castellanos has already made his debut as a late sub versus Chile, and Matias Soule, Giuliano Simeone, and Ezequiel Fernandez could follow suit here
